author: Maurice Musilli

review: Got the cast for watching Netflix mainly, as my TV lacks a client for that. It does a great job at that and has replaced the other options (Wii and/or laptop).  The youtube client is nice too in that it allows for queuing clips on your "watch on tv" list, and those play in sequence.Only reason it does not get a five star rating is that the netflix app (in iOS at least) is a bit slow to respond when the phone is locked and you awake it: as soon as you unlock the phone, even if Netflix is loaded and showing, it takes a few seconds for it to "re-sync" with the cast and start sending commands again.  So if you want to quickly reach "pause", forget it, you'll wait for it to come back, hit pause, and then hit "go back 10s" once you are ready to watch again :-)It would be better if one could use at least play/pause from the TV remote on the chrome cast.
